DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study histological changes, cellularity, clinical efficacy and safety of AZD1981 in patients with Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
DOC.criteria: Men or women 40 years or above FEV1 between 40 and 80% of predicted normal value postbronchodilator Clinical diagnosis of COPD Other clinically relevant disease or disorders Exacerbation of COPD within 30 days
